recommendations.name: *Hibiscus rosa-sinensis* (China Rose)
recommendations.reason: Hibiscus are incredibly heat and humidity tolerant, thriving in the summer conditions of Lucknow. They are relatively drought-tolerant once established, but benefit from regular watering, especially during the hotter months.  Their vibrant flowers add color to the landscape.
recommendations.care: Plant in well-drained soil with partial shade. Water deeply and regularly, especially during hot, dry periods. Fertilize monthly during the growing season. Prune regularly to maintain shape and encourage flowering.

recommendations.name: *Nerium oleander* (Oleander)
recommendations.reason: Oleander is exceptionally drought-tolerant and thrives in hot, sunny conditions. It tolerates poor soil and is a hardy option for a summer garden in Lucknow.  However, extreme caution is advised: all parts of the oleander plant are highly toxic if ingested, so it should be planted away from children and pets.
recommendations.care: Plant in full sun to partial shade in well-drained soil. Water regularly, but allow the soil to dry slightly between waterings.  Prune after flowering to maintain shape.

recommendations.name: *Bougainvillea spectabilis* (Bougainvillea)
recommendations.reason: Bougainvillea is a vigorous climber famed for its vibrant bracts (modified leaves) that appear as flowers. It is extremely heat and drought-tolerant and perfectly suited to Lucknow's summer climate. It can tolerate full sun.
recommendations.care: Plant in well-drained soil in a sunny location.  Provide support for climbing. Water deeply but infrequently, allowing the soil to dry out between waterings. Prune regularly to maintain shape and encourage flowering.

recommendations.name: *Mimusops elengi* (Spanish Cherry)
recommendations.reason: This is a native Indian tree that is highly adapted to the climate, tolerating both heat and drought conditions well. It provides shade, lovely fragrant flowers, and attractive fruits.  It is relatively low-maintenance.
recommendations.care: Plant in well-drained soil in full sun or partial shade. Water regularly during establishment, then less frequently once established. Minimal pruning is needed.

recommendations.name: *Catharanthus roseus* (Madagascar Periwinkle)
recommendations.reason: Periwinkle is a low-maintenance, heat-loving groundcover that thrives in full sun and tolerates poor soil.  It’s known for its profuse blooms throughout the summer and requires relatively little watering once established.
recommendations.care: Plant in well-drained soil in full sun or partial shade. Water regularly, but allow the soil to dry slightly between waterings. Deadhead spent flowers to encourage more blooms.

season.planting_season: Good for heat-tolerant plants, ensure adequate watering
